name: Joannenova Unofficial Readability Improvements
description: Underlines links in each article's post body and in user comments, but leaves all other hyperlinks looking the same.
additional_info:
Some users wanted links to be highlighted more starkly from the surrounding text, and since Firefox "Page Styles" and configuration options do not seem to reliably underline links, a UserStyle for Stylish seemed a good solution.

2013-02-01 : Initial release. Just post and comment hyperlink underlining.
